pages.text: Seriously?...$(br)Did you just enter the wiki page for the wiki?...$(br)Why would you need this..$(br)stop reading....$(br)just why?...$(br)Bro be still reading (insert skull emoji)...$(br)Bro STOP reading NOW!!$(br)You dare opose me mortal?$(br)If you found this easter egg you are a true gamer$(br)El pollo ardiente :)
